description_long: This electric car features a sharply angular, geometric design with a matte dark gray exterior, reminiscent of the Tesla Cybertruck. The body is constructed from flat, faceted panels with minimal curvature, giving it a futuristic, armored appearance. The windows are large, tinted, and trapezoidal, seamlessly integrated into the bodywork, while the wheels are covered with matching dark hubcaps. The front end is characterized by a wide, flat hood and slim headlights, while the rear has a continuous red light bar and a sloped tailgate. The vehicle sits relatively high off the ground, suggesting off-road capability, and the overall silhouette is wedge-shaped. No visible branding, license plate, or charging port is apparent, but the design cues strongly suggest a modern electric pickup.
description: A matte dark gray, angular electric pickup with large tinted windows and a wedge-shaped, armored design.
description_view_0: Front view shows a wide, flat hood, slim headlights, and a sharply angular windshield.
description_view_1: Left side view highlights the geometric, faceted body panels, large windows, and covered wheels.
description_view_2: Rear view displays a sloped tailgate, continuous red light bar, and no visible license plate.
description_view_3: Right side view mirrors the left, showing the same angular panels and window design.
